text: Pawalewadi is a village in India, situated in Mawal taluka of Pune district in the state of Maharashtra. It encompasses an area of . ==Administration== The village is administrated by a sarpanch, an elected representative who leads a gram panchayat. At the time of the 2011 Census of India, the gram panchayat governed two villages and was based at Kalhat. ==Demographics== At the 2011 census, the village comprised 65 households. The population of 346 was split between 167 males and 179 females. ==Air travel connectivity== The closest airport to the village is Pune Airport. ==See also== *List of villages in Mawal taluka ==References== Category:Villages in Mawal taluka
title: Pawalewadi
